>
[Bellflower Toolbelt](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2308)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 145 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 71

**Price** 220 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn belt

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Different versions of the _bellflower toolbelt_ are customized to appear to suit specific trades, so a belt used for carpentry would look different from a belt for baking.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** You place an object of up to 1 Bulk into the belt, transforming that object into a tool befitting the trade for which the belt was created. Each object remains transformed until it has been removed from the belt for 24 hours or someone uses a single Interact action to return it to its normal form. If enough transformed items are in it, the belt can be used as [artisan's tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3) for that trade.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
